page.title: 19Leisure Facilities,A.Cantlow
page.content: The leisure facilities around Aston Cantlow are very good.There is a holiday caravan park with a shop and a telephone.Also there is a tennis club with a playground by it for the children.There is also a pub opposite. By the tennis club there is a working mens club where people go,and there is a womens institute.At the edge of Aston Cantlow there is a signpost saying leisure drive.At Great Alne there is a Cricket Club.The area is covered by footpaths and bridleways everywere.They have lovely country lanes surrounded by countryside.
